nevi-me commented on pull request #5959: ARROW-7312: [Rust] Implement std::error::Error for ArrowError.
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5959#discussion_r353798604
 
 

 ##########
 File path: rust/arrow/src/error.rs
 ##########
 @@ -70,4 +71,12 @@ impl From<::std::string::FromUtf8Error> for ArrowError {
     }
 }
 
+impl Display for ArrowError {
+    fn fmt(&self, f: &mut Formatter<'_>) -> std::fmt::Result {
+        write!(f, "Arrow error happened!")
 
 Review comment:
   Why not display the type of and details ArrowError?

paddyhoran commented on pull request #5959: ARROW-7312: [Rust] Implement std::error::Error for ArrowError.
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5959#discussion_r354346024
 
 

 ##########
 File path: rust/arrow/src/error.rs
 ##########
 @@ -70,4 +71,12 @@ impl From<::std::string::FromUtf8Error> for ArrowError {
     }
 }
 
+impl Display for ArrowError {
+    fn fmt(&self, f: &mut Formatter<'_>) -> std::fmt::Result {
+        write!(f, "Arrow error happened!")
 
 Review comment:
   Yea, I'm with @nevi-me here.  His point is that "Arrow error happened!" is not that informative.  You would also want to know the variant of the enum and any payload, right?

kou commented on issue #5959: ARROW-7312: [Rust] Implement std::error::Error for ArrowError.
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5959#issuecomment-562422189
 
 
   Rust job on AppVeyor has been migrated to GitHub Actions based job. So we don't need to wait for AppVeyor result for changes that only affects to Rust.
   
   FYI: We can disable AppVeyor job check for Rust only changes entirely by the following change:
   
   ```diff
   diff --git a/appveyor.yml b/appveyor.yml
   index a6d79de7e..cd8617893 100644
   --- a/appveyor.yml
   +++ b/appveyor.yml
   @@ -31,7 +31,6 @@ only_commits:
        - python/
        - r/
        - ruby/
   -    - rust/
    
    cache:
      - C:\Users\Appveyor\clcache1
   ```
 
----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.
 
For queries about this service, please contact Infrastructure at:
users@infra.apache.org

fields.description: ArrowError should implement this trait so that other crates can handle error from this crate more friendly.
